comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:6.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0
Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

After I set my margins at 1/2" or more. and entered the header footer information. 


Actual results:

The left/right/top/bottom did not move to coincide with the margins so they did not print. 


Expected results:

The headers should have coincided with the margins and print on the paper. 

Thanks for listening.  

Uncle Dewey
comments.author: deweynelson@juno.com
comments.creator: deweynelson@juno.com
